duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and implement programs from idea to launch in partnership with cross-functional teams.
Own and drive initiatives to continually improve candidate assessment and evaluation processes.
Set deadlines, assign responsibilities, and monitor progress of projects/programs.
Prepare reports for upper management regarding project/program status.
Lead and direct the work of others, relying on extensive experience and judgment.
Perform a variety of tasks with a wide degree of creativity and latitude.
Backfill for an FTE on leave, focusing on process documentation, improvement, and implementation.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree and at least 7 years of experience in the field or in a related area, familiar with a variety of the field's concepts, practices, and procedures.
